title: Xayah + Rakan Icon - Not Received
body:
Hi there!

On April 25 I gifted my boyfriend Rakan and he gifted me Xayah, both of us doing so with RP. I have received the "Wild Magic" (two feathers) icon but not the one of the actual champions together (and as far as I know, neither has he). 

Was wondering if there was a reason for this? I kinda pressured him into it just because of how cute the icon was... would suck if we ended up actually doing something wrong. Thanks in advance!

replies.body: Cute overload, it's always why I try ti get my hands on Poro icons.  :P  It looks like you already received your icon earlier this afternoon.  If anyone here still hasn't received it, double check as we rolled out more today!

Ah, thank you! I just logged in and saw it waiting for me. :) I was starting to get concerned because of how many people were commenting that they hadn't received it yet. But this is resolved, so yay!

I also gifted Xayah to a friend with RP and did not get the icon.
Same friend gifted Xayah to me with IP and got their icon three days ago.

I confirmed by looking at the past posts about the icons and if you gifted with RP you SHOULD get the icon too. Maybe those that bought it with RP haven't been handed out yet.
I haven't received that icon either after gifting one of my friends Xayah with RP
